subject: Paralympic Games
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius lost for the first time in a 200-meter final when Alan Oliveira of Brazil won by 0.07 second and dethroned Pistorius in a time of 21.45 seconds in the Paralympics in London.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius lost for the first time in a 200-meter final when Alan Oliveira of Brazil won by 0.07 second and dethroned Pistorius in a time of 21.45 seconds in the Paralympics in London.
